participant_1.background:
My most valued possession is my fitness tracker because it helps me to track my progress and stay motivated.
my mother is a dentist.
i love to bake cakes.
my favorite tv show is silicon valley.
I'm not very active on social media, but I like sharing pictures of my walks with my friends and family.

I like dressing up for special occasions, but I prefer to wear comfortable clothing on a regular day.
i was a mechanic for 6 years.
i am a financial analyst for a brewery.
I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.
I'm from LA, and I like to wear comfortable clothes because I'm always on the go.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm a big fan of Silicon Valley. What's your favorite TV show?
I love Silicon Valley too! It's so funny and relatable. My favorite TV show is probably The Office.
The Office is great! I love Michael Scott. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a financial analyst for a brewery. It's a lot of fun and I get to drink beer all day.
That sounds like an awesome job! I'm a baker. I love baking cakes and cookies.
That's so cool! I love baking too. I'm not very good at it, but I love eating it.
Well, as long as you enjoy it, that's all that matters.
I do! I love baking cakes for my friends and family.
That's so sweet of you! I'm sure they love it.
They do! I'm always happy to bake for them.
They do. I'm lucky to have such a great family and friends.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good support system
